nodes.text: Kuthard was a planet located in the Sepan sector of the Expansion Region.

It was a visit to Kuthard, in 137 ABY, that changed Galactic Alliance Defense Force Admiral Gar Stazi's opinion of the galaxy and its chances for peace after he conversed with an elderly Dimok female who lived on the planet.
Jason Fry confirmed during discussions about the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion that Kuthard was located in the Sepan system.
